column5: Just a heads up for anyone who is looking for some boxing day fishing sales. Brian and Steve at J&B's are open from 10:30 till 5:00 and they are doing No Tax on all regular priced stuff and GST only on sale items....... Robin
Thanks for the heads up Robin. I'll be travelling right past on boxing day. Will have to stop in for a visit.  Mike
awesome!!!!! please tell them I will be there!
Sweet. I'll try to make it down as well.  Crystal Ball tells me I have a JBs gift cert in my stocking.

I think JB's is about the only thing I miss after moving away from Toronto a year and a half ago.  Will have to visit them at the spring fishing show where I will walk away with many more musky baits than I need.
Does that mean your Christmas present to me will be  a day late this year?
Thanks for the heads-up. I think LeB usually has a no tax sale on Boxing Day too...  Mike
Crystal Balls ? ... that could make running a dangerous thing  better walk instead
Looks like it will be an OFC swill!
is it all week or just boxing day?
